name: Inspire Medical Systems, Inc.
description: Inspire Medical Systems, Inc. is a medical device company focused on developing innovative solutions for patients suffering from obstructive sleep apnea (OSA), a serious and often undiagnosed condition affecting millions worldwide. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Golden Valley, Minnesota, Inspire has pioneered a unique implantable therapy known as Inspire therapy, which utilizes a small device implanted in the body to stimulate the hypoglossal nerve during sleep, preventing airway collapse and improving breathing. This minimally invasive treatment option provides a significant improvement over traditional CPAP therapy for patients who cannot tolerate or benefit from it. The company is committed to advancing the field of sleep medicine, and its Inspire therapy has received FDA approval and has been clinically proven to enhance the quality of life for patients. With a strong focus on research and development, Inspire Medical Systems aims to innovate and expand its product offerings, ensuring that more patients can find effective solutions for their sleep apnea needs. As awareness of sleep apnea grows, Inspire is positioned to lead the charge in transforming the landscape of sleep apnea treatment.
